title: Knife Handle, ca. 1650–75
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Handle of cast brass in form of standing lion holding shield on rosette decorated socle at front. Floral decoration on base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife Handle, ca. 1650–75.
ca. 1650–75. brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-7.
